steps.title: Add Function
steps.description: Write a function that takes two arguments and returns their sum.
steps.explanation: Define a function using def and return the result.

steps.title: Subtract Function
steps.description: Create a function that subtracts the second number from the first.
steps.explanation: Functions can perform any operation. Use return to return the result.

steps.title: Combine with Input
steps.description: Use input() to read two numbers from the user and add them.
steps.starterCode:
a = int(input())
b = int(input())
print(a + b)
steps.explanation: Use input() to read user input, convert it to int with int().
